resources.string: Turn of all sounds will still (i.e. not moving) and being at/near a cinema.
When changing the activity from anything to running, increase the volume by 20%. When changing back, decrease by 20%.
Remind me that I wanted to shop something when being near a shop and open the shopping list app (Google Keep, if installed).
It seems like you started running. Raising volume by 20%.
It seems like you stopped running. Lowering volume by 20%.
You wanted to be reminded when near a shop.
You seem to be watching a movie in a cinema. Disabling any sound.
